Headline: #70 Division Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Dearborn/Walton
ShortDescription: Eastbound 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Dearborn, Oak, and Clark (Layover) due to street blockage near Dearborn/Walton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Dearborn, Oak, and Clark (Layover) due to street blockage near Dearborn/Walton.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green and Brown Line Delays; Normal routing has Resumed
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green and Brown Line Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at State/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green and Brown Line Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at State/Lake.  Normal routing has resumed.  Allow extra time.

 Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
